body:
Dear reader,

As you could see from my profile: i have been banned for killaura (i dont use that)
Sadly enough there are staff members who ban without spectating long enough to get to know a player (yes i mean you jake41901). Some staffmembers like jozzmcozz. Doctapop or izjust4fun have known me for longer and do know i dont hack. I would like to ask one of the (better?) mods to unban me since im a legit player and i would like to continue playing on this server.

kingt64
body_tagged:

As you could see from my profile: i have been banned for killaura (i dont use that)

Doctapop or izjust4fun have known me for longer and do know i dont hack. I would like to ask one of the (better?) mods to unban me since im a legit player and i would like to continue playing on this server.

kingt64

replies.body: Ik i made a typo because i thought it was unfair, i was maybe a bit too dast in naking a post. I dont know exactly the difference between killaura and klickaimbot. I mean its both illigal and i dont use either of them. And maybe yes they are human, but should i just be happy because i got banned while im legit? Hate or anger is missplaced when the judgement is correct and the player deserves to be banned. I am a fair player so i have the right to be pissed if i get banned. I mean its a nice community and a nice server. And i wont hate jake if he admits being wrong (nor will i when i keep being banned but i will continue thinking that its unfair). replies.body:
And also, I don't think this should get a lock. Ok, maybe he should appeal it on that email thingy support, but who cares if he makes a thread about it? Imagine you were banned for hacking when you know you don't hack. Would be kinda annoying wouldn't it? People need to be able to see things from others perspective before the start judging and hating.

EDIT: See? People hate on him for saying "prob 12 yo". Well, you guys don't know how he feels about this, because you're not the ones that are falsely banned for hacking. Its frustrating to be banned for no reason, you guys should be able to see things from his side, not judge right of the start. 

Also, I like these kind of discussions. People support kingt, others support Jake. Imo, mods should be able to know the difference between hacking and being good. They should also know about hacking. By that I mean they should know the most used hacked clients, how to bust them, and last but not least don't falsely ban people for hacking. .-.
replies.body_tagged:
And also, I don't think this should get a lock. Ok, maybe he should appeal it on that email thingy support, but who cares if he makes a thread about it? Imagine you were banned for hacking when you know you don't hack. Would be kinda annoying wouldn't it? People need to be able to see things from others perspective before the start judging and hating.

EDIT: See? People hate on him for saying "prob 12 yo". Well, you guys don't know how he feels about this, because you're not the ones that are falsely banned for hacking. Its frustrating to be banned for no reason, you guys should be able to see things from his side, not judge right of the start. 

Also, I like these kind of discussions. People support kingt, others support Jake. Imo, mods should be able to know the difference between hacking and being good. They should also know about hacking. By that I mean they should know the most used hacked clients, how to bust them, and last but not least don't falsely ban people for hacking. .-.

replies.body: Guys, listen. You too, king. I banned you for Kill Aura. Obviously, every single other Mod disagrees. I'm sorry. I made a mistake, apparently you're just an OP PVPer. Everyone makes mistakes. I do, Sr.Mods do, even Managers do. Yes, I properly spectated you, and yes, it looked like you were hacking. I'd never seen your username before or heard ANYTHING about you, so I didn't assume it was OP PVP. Apparently it was, and I made a mistake. But do NOT, call me inexperienced. I don't care who you are. Whether I made a mistake or not, you have no right to be calling me out on something I did incorrectly. Yes, it's my fault I banned you for an inaccurate reason. Yes, I made a mistake. But no, I am NOT inexperienced. I'm not cocky. I know I'm not the best Moderator out there, but I know damn straight and most Avicus users that actually KNOW me would agree with me, that I am NOT inexperienced.                                                                                                                                                                                                            Good luck in your appeal.
replies.body_tagged: Guys, listen. You too, king. I banned you for Kill Aura. Obviously, every single other Mod disagrees. I'm sorry. I made a mistake, apparently you're just an OP PVPer. Everyone makes mistakes. I do, Sr.Mods do, even Managers do. Yes, I properly spectated you, and yes, it looked like you were hacking. I'd never seen your username before or heard ANYTHING about you, so I didn't assume it was OP PVP. Apparently it was, and I made a mistake. But do NOT, call me inexperienced. I don't care who you are. Whether I made a mistake or not, you have no right to be calling me out on something I did incorrectly. Yes, it's my fault I banned you for an inaccurate reason. Yes, I made a mistake. But no, I am NOT inexperienced. I'm not cocky. I know I'm not the best Moderator out there, but I know damn straight and most Avicus users that actually KNOW me would agree with me, that I am NOT inexperienced.                                                                                                                                                                                                            Good luck in your appeal.

reply_to.body:
Don't call out mods as bad just because they banned you. Jake is an experienced mod and a fine pvp'er. If you truly believed you were falsely banned, email the staff.  Also, the staff are human and can make mistakes. Respect that. 



If it hasn't been said already, Jake is 15 or 16
